website_summaries.verdict: A resizable gear chain really takes this set to the next level, as far as STEM learning goes. Designed for ages 4 and up.
pros: Comes with 192 gears and blocks in many colors and sizes
Also includes resizeable chain, 2 pegboards, connector pieces, and idea sheet
cons: Try to be gentle with the pegs on the pegboard, as they can break off

customer_reviews.title: He really enjoyed "making" the chain and watching how it made all ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an add-on to the original set I purchased for my grandson's 4th birthday. He really enjoyed "making" the chain and watching how it made all the gears work together. His uncle is an engineer and he was having a great time with it as well... and his mother loved the nice storage tub it comes in too! I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Jumbo Gears Set for our grandkids who are three and six years old. They were fascinated with the gears. We showed them several things that they could build, and in no time they became creative and made things that we had not thought of. This is a great way to stimulate their young minds instead of having them watch TV or a computer screen. Fred M.
customer_reviews.author: Fred M.

customer_reviews.title: great product, but suggest for older kids.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son's 5th birthday, because he loves taking things apart and putting it together again. But these just might be a little too much for him with all the interlocking pieces and figuring out how they each work with one another. I would recommend it for an older child.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Gears and chain are great
customer_reviews.text: The gear set is fantastic - my three year old loves them, the chain links are what makes this better than other sets, and we have even started adding the gears and chains to other toys, such as the tricycle, to spread the fun around.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: The chain was hard to move and make wheels spin. Very disappointed Update: I received a replacement and it works awesome
customer_reviews.author: Camila

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: some part are not strong enough to pullout from the hole and reinsert into, we have broke several. But in general, this is a good STEM toy to let kid play by set up their mind of Gears. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Yi

customer_reviews.title: very few gears
customer_reviews.text: not as many gears as we thought it would be, but a plethora of other parts. If thinking of getting a smaller set, don't do it, get the largest set you can to have a variety of gears to work with. 2.5 year old loves it with some help.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great for creativity & gear play
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old & 10 year old both like to create with this! The directions are impossible to follow if you are trying to create from the book. You cannot tell exactly which holes to,place pieces in. But for just creating their own things, it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Raddy

customer_reviews.title: Great "toy"
customer_reviews.text: Kids get this and have fun at their level of understanding. As their understanding grows they create more complex outcomes. Great for mechanical reasoning
customer_reviews.author: Acquisitions Inc

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality, the gears would not connect well, we returned the toy.
customer_reviews.author: CTMommy

customer_reviews.title: ... it 5 stars but the pieces fall apart rather easily..
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars but the pieces fall apart rather easily... once together, with careful cranking, the kiddos have enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are cool! I honestly bought them for make a cup ...
customer_reviews.text: These are cool! I honestly bought them for make a cup rotisserie lol. They come in an awesome plastic bin with locking side and a handle for easy storage and cleanup. bright color smooth surfaces, I wish I had found these when my kids were young enough
customer_reviews.author: toni gardner

customer_reviews.title: These were a big hit in Pre-K
customer_reviews.text: The set of gears was used as a science center for use by 3 to 5 four-year-olds/five-year-olds at a time. They were interesting, durable and easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Howard fan from TX

customer_reviews.title: Good toy for toddler
customer_reviews.text: My 1 1/2 year old loves ... I love it
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little engineers!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 year old grandson for Christmas. He is really into putting things together and will absolutely love this!!
customer_reviews.author: Susie B Easley

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough for kids.
customer_reviews.text: If its for kids, it should be sturdier and stand up to kids. The pegs have already broken off, the build does not stay up if we rotate the lever, and in general it wobbles.
customer_reviews.author: arun

customer_reviews.title: My 2. 5 year old grandson gets engrossed building ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old grandson gets engrossed building stuff with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It isn't the best quality but my five year loves it keeps him entertained
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Luiz

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Great gifts for the youngins, and the storage tub it comes in is a nice bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandson has hours of fun.
customer_reviews.text: This was the second set of ETI that we purchased. Grandson has hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Fun, well made and challenging.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, good fit, challenging but successfully assembled by a 5 year old and his grandpa.
customer_reviews.author: Myra

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 and 4 year old loves these. The included storage container is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Kihuga

customer_reviews.title: Great open ended toy that will grow with your child!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is great! Kids can make so many different products with it. Great use of creativity!
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My four year old loves building with this set. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amy S

customer_reviews.title: Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it, likes the movement he can create.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This is my son's new favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 21-month old son. This toy keeps him entertained for hours. It's easily the best purchase I've ever made for him.
customer_reviews.author: Zain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The kids in my first grade classroom love these, and they have gotten so creative!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for imaginative minds!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 5 yr old as one of his Xmas gifts. I'm all for fun toys that help little minds grow. He loves it; he's constantly building things and gets excited when he learns/ figures something new out. I love it because he's entertained, challenged, and it comes in a sturdy box he knows he puts everything back in. I'm about to order another one for my nephew who has ADHD since he seems to like it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Ivette

customer_reviews.title: Critical Thinking
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that my grandchildren have to use critical thinking to figure out how to make the gears move at different angles. I even enjoy putting them together. I had one gear that was deformed and I contacted the company, sent a picture and had a new one within a week. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Farmwife

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment without electronic devices involved.
customer_reviews.text: My sons loves this set. At 5 years old it keeps him entertained for hours. He evens get his older siblings involved. Ordered additional but different sets for him to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Anyone can build something fun.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of fun! Comes with nice clear plastic storage box.......NICE !!! Big pieces, easily snap together and take apart. Fast Sipping.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hart

product_meta.title: ETI Toys, STEM Learning, 192 Piece Jumbo Gears Set with Resizeable Interlocking Chain, Connector Pieces and 2 Pegboards. Build Endless Designs. Gift, Toy for 3, 4, 5 Year Old Boys and Girls.
feature_bullets: MUCH BETTER ALTERNATIVE TO TELEVISION OR IPADS More and more research is pointing to children’s overuse of technology as the culprit of behavioral and learning problems. Your kids deserve better than that. Challenge their minds and imagination with our educational jumbo gear building sets for kids. They will challenge your little ones and encourage creativity, problem solving, and motor skills --crucial building blocks to a child’s mental foundation.

ENDLESS WAYS TO PLAY Our kids engineering and learning kits come with so many pieces, the ways your child can utilize each part is endless. Your kid can create a winding gear train, a cranking tower with a fan or any wacky interlocking contraption you can imagine. Build whatever you want. The possibilities are tireless. With the ETI construction building sets, your child can create so many things, it’ll spark creativity and motor skills that he or she will benefit from for years to come.

HELP YOUR CHILD BUILD SOCIAL SKILLS AT AN EARLY AGE. We believe that social development, teamwork and collaboration are critical to success in today's world. Jumbo Gears was designed to develop the foundation of these at an early age. Our building sets for kids age 7 and younger encourages children to work together as a team to build awesome creations. In doing so, your children learn how to share and work together, giving them a sense of achievement and camaraderie.

SAFE FOR YOUR CHILD, SUPER-CONVENIENT FOR YOU! – Cleaning up after playtime will become a breeze, since your jumbo building blocks are super-easy to clean and come with a handy storage box for your maximum convenience! And the best part? Our toys are tested by an independent third-party and are certified Safe, BPA-safe, Lead-safe, Phthalates-safe and skin-safe! We put our money where our mouth is and that's why we offer 100% Money Back Guarantee!

ABOVE ALL, WE WANT TO PUT A SMILE ON YOUR CHILD’S FACE! – When it comes to your child’s safety and physical and educational well-being, you don’t have to compromise! Our educational STEM toys are designed by child education experts in order to spark creativity and imagination without posing any risk! Can you really afford to miss out on this chance to boost your child’s potential?
